title.rendered: Outback Armour 4T/6M Off-Road Recoil Tow Strap

content.rendered:
You never know when you or a mate will need a tow back to civilisation. The Outback Armour 4T/6M Off-Road Recoil Tow Strap is engineered to recoil when slack to reduce risk of entanglement around tyres and abrasion from surfaces during use.

Tow straps are not permitted to be used on road surfaces in Australia. This product is intended for off-road recovery purposes only.

Specifications Details
Length: 6 metres (3 metres recoiled)
Strength: 4 tonne
Colour: outback orange
Material: polyester

excerpt.rendered: Never go alone.. but you’ll need your own straps for recovery!
